review: Dr. Surbhi patienly listened, and treated very professionally. She has profound knowledge and vast experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
Dr. Surbhi and Dr. Amandeep are amazing doctors and amazing people. They examined my situation well and provided me with a good treatment plan. Even after being super busy they gave me appointments according to my convenience. They are highly professional yet super understanding and friendly. They maintain good hygiene in the clinic and ask if I need water every single time I visit. 
My previous dentist didn‚Äôt do RTC properly which they corrected and I was relieved from my pain. 
Both the doctors are very comforting and respectful.
I am thankful that I have come across such amazing doctors and wonderful people. üíñ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Surbhi Anand is brilliant! Friendly and putting my anxiety at ease, she continued to complete the procedure with care and precision. Overall, a wonderful doctor that comes highly recommended! Kudos Doc

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Surbhi is one of *** ******, patient and most meticulous doctor I have come across in my life. She changed my world view of what dentists look like and are like. I wouldn't want to go to another dentist now after my wonderful experience with her. She explained the problems and treatment to me through the process unlike most doctors. Her finesse is evident as my denture was a tricky one to fix but she did it flawlessly. Post the treatment she even followed up with me to ensure I was doing well. Her fees is also cost-effective *** * ********* ******* *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *****

tags: Value for money,
review: ************ ** *** *** ***** ** ** * *** ** ******* ********* If you go for anything extra, the charges are too high! I went for getting my teeth cleaned and the doctor without telling me the price started preparing for the procedure. Only after me asking the price she told me that she charges INR 2,500 for cleaning!! I refused to get treated, and she still charged me INR 300, for doing nothing. * **** ******** **** ***** ******** *** ***** ******* *** **** ***** **** **** *** ** ********* Highly inflated prices! And I am highly disappointed!
reply_text:
Dear sir....
We would like to apologise for your disappointment pertaining to our treatment charges..
We would also like to bring to your notice that the teeth cleaning charges are inclusive of teeth polishing and irrigation..

As far as your other concern regarding INR 300 charged from you, it is our consultation fee and not included in the treatment charges..
We wish you all the best for your future endeavours and hope that you got a satisfactory dental treatment done from your dentist of choice.

Best regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: i had contacted dr. amandeep and dr surabhi for my husband and mother in law's wisdom tooth issues. I must say, we (as a family) found best doctor in dental speciality. The diagnosis was perfect in 1st visit and they explained every thing so perfectly that all the fear gone away. My husband and mother in law then went for tooth extraction in 2nd visit and that experience was also very good. patient did not felt any pain during the process and even after hours of process which was the best part of whole experience. i must recommend Dr surabhi and amandeep for all type of dental problems.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited Dr. Surbhi Anand during the second phase of the lockdown. She performed a root canal and alleviated severe pain. The clinic is well-equipped - especially with regard to COVID-related precautions.

Dr. Anand has a pleasant demeanour, and she takes the time to explain the treatment - its nuances, choices available, and their pros and cons. She does not push her own point-of-view; rather, she allows patients to reach an informed decision.

I was impressed by her clinical ability, and was fully satisfied with the treatment offered. I plan to switch to Dental Bliss for all upcoming dental needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr.Anand with a deep cavity in my wisdom tooth..She is such a soft spoken doctor that it instantly calmed me down. She explained the procedures to me and performed a RCT on my tooth and other fillings. Generally RCT takes a long time but Dr.Anand understood my situation as I didn't have more than two weeks and accommodated my frequent appointments in her busy schedule..that was very considerate of her..I healed pretty fast only because of Dr.Anand. I also visited Dr.Dhillon at Dental bliss for a gum contouring and it was an equally nice experience.Doctors at Dental Bliss are always on time and most of all they understand  and respect their patients' time. That makes them my dentist for life now üòÅ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
This is the first time I have written a review for anyone but didn't want to leave the chance of sharing my experience with Dr. Surbhi Anand. She and her team patiently explained everything that they were doing and listened to everything that I had to say. She kept me calm during all my appointments. After visiting many different dentists I can say that Dr. Surbhi and her team are the best i have seen and I will continue to go there and would HIGHLY recommend her to you. 

I literally feel part of her family today and not only is the treatment amazing but she will always give you her honest opinion. Most trustworthy doctor I have ever met till now. The service is cost effective and extremely efficient. You will never have any complaints with this doctor. :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited doctor surabhi for the first time for getting scaling done. She is a great doctor and a beautiful person in personal. She firstly explained me about the problem and then about the treatment that can be done to cure it. She did her job perfectly. She is so very concerned about her patients. She pinged me a couple of times to ask me if I had any sensitivity after scaling. 
I had a perfect experience with her. I would recommend people to visit her. 
Thank you so much doctor. Will see you soon

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Surbhi is extremely professional and polite. she explains the procedure to your satisfaction and responds to all queries. She is very patient during the procedure and creates a very comfortable and friendly atmosphere. tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Post and Core,Zirconia Crowns,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
I went with the issue of a completely fractured tooth, for which other dentists had recommended me extraction and an expensive dental implant.
But, Dr. Surbhi took the initiative to save my money and my tooth by doing RCT and a post and core treatment. Her thorough explanation of the treatment and patience makes her an exceptional dentist.
She is friendly, polite and surely an expert in her domain.
Definitely recommend it to anyone looking for an ethical dental professional.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dental Bliss after suffering from exteme tooth ache for months after getting my root canals done from some place else. Both Dr Surbhi and Dr Aman are extremely ************* *** very friendly.  Not only are they exceptional at their job, they are genuinely some of the nicest doctors you'll meet. Unlike most other dentists , they will never do any unnecessary procedures on you just for the purpose of a higher bill. Would highly recommend them for any dental problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: DR Surbhi is very talented she has patience,considering her age she is much calme. Yesterday she saw the condition of my tooth, it was broken from the middle with a cavity. She took two hours to construct the tooth. I am totally satisfied with her work.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I visited Dental bliss amid lockdown. I called the clinic and had an conversation with Dr.Anand, her way of explaining the issues was so pleasing. On the very next day i visited the clinic and got my teeth fixed. 
I had the best treatment and Dr.Anand is so amazing. She at first checked my teeth and pointed out the issues which i later need to fixed them & for that i will visit her soon. Then she started my treatment and it was so good. She is super friendly,skilled and professional.
I would highly recommend her.
Regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Surbhi is really kind, organised and patient. I had been to multiple dentists before deciding on Dental Bliss as I couldn‚Äôt find a dentist whom I was comfortable with. 

The clinic is super clean. During covid times, they ensure patients are spaced out,  clinic is constantly sanitized and provide PPE suits for the patients too. 

Both Dr. Aman and Dr. Surbhi are always more than happy to answer all the questions patiently, and explain the procedure. They are also extremely thorough and ensure that there is minimum pain and discomfort. They have also been ever so kind, to follow up and be available for any queries post the treatment. 

I would definitely recommend them to every person, and would trust them completely with my dental health.

review: Visited Dr. Surbhi for pain in my tooth and alignment of teeth. As I reside in Canada was short on time. She understood my situation and did my root canal in a single sitting without any pain or discomfort. Got my scans also done for Invisalign within a day. I'm impressed with the advancements in dentistry in India now. The team is taking full precautions in disinfection protocol. My Best Regards.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had visited the clinic for my alignment problems and to know more about Invisalign. Dr. Surbhi explained everything in detail and did not advice any unnecessary treatment. Much to my surprise  the root canal and implant done were quick and painless. I felt very comfortable and warm. Very excited to start my Invisalign journey with her. My best wishes.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I highly recommend Dr. Amandeep Dhillon & Dr. Surabhi Anand (Dental bliss) the best dentists i ever had. I had a minor surgical procedure & a root canal, even had some stitches but never felt any pain. They (Dr. Amandeep & Dr. Surabhi) explained everything to me about the problem and discussed why and how the procedure is done. Very professional, skillful gentle and caring. The place is easy to find, high tech and clean.
